Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

OOC: My turn with Abominus.

:::Abominus/Sky Lynx:::

::Abominus moves his head out of the way, but not before getting slashed a 
bit there.  He cries out in rage and fires 4 shots at Galaxor.  Meanwhile, 
Sky Lynx is on the sidelines, with all my other Maximals in stasis lock from 
battle::
Sky Lynx: I can't just sit around watching that giant bot destroy everything!
::He fires on Abominus.  Abominus turns his head at the source::
Sky Lynx: that's right! Im taking you out!
::Abominus, without any hint of emotion or expression, swats the flying Sky 
Lynx down::
Sky Lynx: Ufgghhhh
::Abominus raises his foot and crushes Sky Lynx to death. he's gone::

--part1_ea.14eaa8c6.28236b6a_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
